input.sentences: my sister and i were enjoying hitting a volleyball around .
i hit the ball too hard and it went way up in the air .
oops ! the ball land up on the roof .
we took another volleyball to knock it back down .
after several attempts | we hit success as the ball came back down to us .
output.sentences: My sister is the best at hitting the volleyball.
My sister hit the ball hard enough to sent it over on the roof.
Oops, the ball landed on the roof.
We had to take another volleyball to knock the other ball off the roof.
We were successful in hitting the second ball to dislodge the first ball.
